location: Near Zhishan MRT Station, Tianmu SOGO, Carrefour
notes: Recently renovated apartment with clean marble-style tile floors, modern recessed lighting, and wall-mounted AC. Rooms appear unfurnished with fresh paint and new curtains. Excellent location near MRT and shopping amenities.
